SELECT
'i'||iv.record_num||'a' AS "record #",
cho.loanrule_code_num AS "loan rule #",
'p'||pv.record_num||'a' AS "p rec #",
cho.checkout_gmt::date AS "co date",
cho.renewal_count AS "renewals",
cho.overdue_count AS "odues #",
cho.overdue_gmt::date AS "odue date",
pv.ptype_code  AS "ptype",
prf.last_name||', '||prf.first_name||' '||prf.middle_name AS "name",
iv.location_code AS "location",
iv.itype_code_num AS "itype"

FROM
sierra_view.item_view AS iv,
sierra_view.checkout AS cho,
sierra_view.patron_view AS pv,
sierra_view.patron_record_fullname AS prf

WHERE 
cho.item_record_id = iv.id AND
cho.patron_record_id = pv.id AND 
pv.id = prf.patron_record_id AND 
iv.record_num in (
'9101951',
'9103511',
'9105294',
'9108764',
'9122443',
